Review.Titre: I usually never complain about anything…
Review.Contenu: I usually never complain about anything but I will about this. I ordered my part almost 2 weeks ago and I have yet to receive it yet. It has been all around my delivery location but has yet to make it to my house. I will make sure to never order from here as the 3-5 business day shipping is a lie.

Review.Titre: The heating element sparked and shorted…
Review.Contenu: The heating element sparked and shorted out the entire oven range. The information was relayed to repair parts via their "contact us" page. I asked for a refund and I have not been contacted by them regarding this issue.

Review.Titre: I'm glad I saved all the original…
Review.Contenu: I'm glad I saved all the original parts, bc it definitely wasn't all the right parts. Tracking is stupid with this company and eith them being aware of it, they would rather be rude/smart about it then understand the issue. I'd definitely find a different company to buy from!

The delivery took 20 days from time of order for a part that was in stock. Ordered on June 27th, received on July 17th. After the delay in receiving the part, the package was received damaged. I've yet to determine if the part is OK.

Unfortunately I had to cut wires on the sensor and now have no recourse to return it.

Only negative is that the shipping tracking information was not updated. So never knew when it was to arrive.  Product does work good though.

As a replacement for 5 crescent Whirlpool ice maker, service and price was ok. One plastic tab that holds the ice “slide” that channels crescents into door dispenser was broken off. That tab was present in the packaging, so it broken in transit or warehouse. It is kind of a pain to have to repair the replacement part…. So, only four stars.

Part arrived quickly.  Didn't seem to be the same quality as the OEM but it does work!  The funnel for where the water drops into the icemaker is considerably but it seems fine as not seeing drips.  Making ice again at 1/2 the price of the OEM parts.  Directions were good not great.  Used an YouTube video instead.  Would buy again, nice overall value.

Review.Titre: Replacement Magnetron for Panasonic Microwave Oven
Review.Contenu: Purchased a magnetron for my older Panasonic Microwave. The new part was defective, so I had to return it. A replacement was sent to me, and it is working fine. The part looks well made; it is a perfect fit for the original component. I would have awarded 5-stars if the original part had worked! The price was competitive, although the fact the RMA did not include return shipping added to my total cost. I like the fact the magnetron came with a new high-voltage diode.

Review.Contenu: I bought a replacement cable for my ice maker because the thermal in-line fuse blew. The new cable wouldn't click into place on the refrigerator end. Was very frustrating. Had to splice the good thermal fuse to the original cable. The cable ends looked very similar and I tried to make it fit several times to no avail.

It looks different (improved) from their picture on line and different from original, however it 'plugged' in perfectly and works like new.The one star demerit is because the 'new and improved' pump isn't exactly like the old pump.

Two part review here.  Chapter 1 - OrderingLocating and ordering the desired part was fairly straightforward and was "nothing to write home about".  It works like it should. Chapter 2 - The replacement part (cue sinister sounding organ music)I ordered a replacement Ice Maker (PS1993870) for my GE fridge.  The part was one of those 'compatible' replacement kits which always inspires fear and trepidation to those who have experience replacing things.  Unfortunately this was another one of those cases.  The kit included a plethora of parts to help match a number of different models of existing ice makers and you have to decide what combination works on your fridge.  Depending on the model you're replacing I suspect this will be fairly trivial task. Mine however, was a little more complex due to the design change which required me to research how ice makers actually work (youtube as always is invaluable for this).  With this newfound wisdom, I'm happy to report the replacement part does indeed work for my fridge and now beautifully formed ice is magically appearing again within the confines of my freezer.  Equally important, the maker now knows when the ice bin is full and to call it a day.
Service was quick.  Replacement part works good.  Tracking was a bit off, as I never knew status until package arrived.

My experience with this company was made great by the customer service I received. Initially, the young lady I spoke to was not very knowledgeable about the product, but she did find somebody who was and provide me with guidance. She also sent me an email regarding the modifications that had to be made to the new part prior to installation. This was most helpful and made my job successful.
My purchase was fairly priced, and shipment was quick.Item was easy to find online, and was accurately described.

Review.Titre: This is a company that backs their word
Review.Contenu: I believe that reviews are written to inform the public of your experience that you encounter with the product or service and I have to give Repair Parts Inc a thumbs up. I had ordered a part for my refrigerator  they didn’t waste anytime getting the part out to me, which I really appreciated. I replaced the old part with the new one and it didn’t seem to work. I read the return policy and I decided to bite the bullet and take my losses. I submitted a review based on what I thought was unfair with the return policy. A few days later I got a reply from the Director of sales and he informed me that everything would be taken care of if I wish to continue with the return. I took him up on it and I can’t say enough about the support I received from the people that worked there. I am very grateful and pleased with the outcome. First class operation.

Review.Titre: I ordered this part on July 8th 2023 to…
Review.Contenu: I ordered this part on July 8th 2023 to replace the oven igniter. I travel for work majorities of my time and when I’m home I try to get things done. Today, August 5th, 2013, I finally had time to replace the part. I opened the box and found the coils were broken and in pieces in the box. I understand this is most likely the shipping provider but the part wasn’t wrapped in bubble wrap and just laying in the box. Now I have to pay for another part. Idk if I would order from here again unless they send me another part at no cost, wrapped how it should be.8/22/23I would like to add on to my review. My original review was a 1star and I was mad in the moment. I did not expect for this company to do what they did and send me a new one. Stand up company. I apologize for the original review.
